Meta.title: Video2PPT - Free AI-Powered Video to PowerPoint Converter
Meta.description: Convert any video to PPT presentations for free. Support local videos, online links, and real-time screen recording. AI-powered content extraction with privacy protection. Perfect for meetings, education, and content creation.
Meta.keywords: video to ppt, video converter, powerpoint generator, ai video processing, screen recording, meeting notes, educational tools, free converter, presentation maker, video analysis

Nav.title: Video2PPT
Nav.description: Free tool to convert videos to PPT

HomePage.title: Convert Videos to PowerPoint
HomePage.subtitle: Whether it's local videos, online courses, or real-time screen recording, Video2PPT can quickly extract key content and generate professional slides. Perfect for meeting notes, study materials, course summaries, and more.

multiSource.title: Multiple Sources Support
multiSource.description: Local videos, online video links, YouTube, Bilibili and other platforms, one-click import and fast processing.

realTimeRecording.title: Real-time Screen Recording
realTimeRecording.description: Record while meeting, automatically identify screen content, extract key information, and efficiently record meeting points.

smartExtraction.title: Smart Content Extraction
smartExtraction.description: Automatically identify text, charts, and key content in videos to generate structured PPT, saving time and effort.

step1.title: Upload or Provide Video
step1.description: Upload local video files, provide online video links, or choose to record screen directly.

step2.title: Smart Processing & Analysis
step2.description: Our AI system automatically analyzes video content, identifies key information, and extracts important frames and text.

step3.title: Download PPT File
step3.description: Complete processing in minutes, generate professional PPT files that can be downloaded directly or edited further.

meetingRecords.title: Online Meeting Records
meetingRecords.description: Record online meetings in real-time, automatically generate meeting minutes PPT, making team collaboration more efficient.

studyNotes.title: Course Study Notes
studyNotes.description: Convert online course videos into structured study notes to improve learning efficiency.

seminarContent.title: Seminar Content Extraction
seminarContent.description: Attend online seminars, automatically extract key content, and generate essence summaries.

teachingVideos.title: Teaching Videos to PPT
teachingVideos.description: Convert teaching videos into courseware, convenient for teachers to prepare lessons and students to review.

speechContent.title: Speech Content Organization
speechContent.description: Convert speech videos into PPT, extract speech key points, convenient for subsequent sharing.

tutorialKnowledge.title: Tutorial Knowledge Extraction
tutorialKnowledge.description: Extract key knowledge points from video tutorials and generate learning materials.

cta.title: Start Using For Free
cta.description: No registration required, no payment needed. Experience the powerful features of Video2PPT immediately and boost your work and study efficiency!

LocalVideo.title: Local Video to PPT
LocalVideo.support: Supports common video formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, WebM, with a single file size limit of 100MB.
LocalVideo.quickDetection: Skip metadata loading, directly use seek and binary search to detect duration, improving processing speed
LocalVideo.webmEnhanced: WebM format is using enhanced detection algorithm, may take longer
LocalVideo.advantages: Advantages of Local Video to PPT
LocalVideo.noServer: No need to upload to server
LocalVideo.privacy: All processing done on your device, protecting privacy
LocalVideo.accurate: Accurately extract text, charts and important content from videos
LocalVideo.saveTime: Complete conversion in minutes, saving lots of manual organization time
LocalVideo.ssimImprove: Using SSIM algorithm to improve accuracy

ScreenRecording.title: Real-time Screen Recording to PPT
ScreenRecording.description: After clicking start recording, please select "Entire Screen" option to start recording. The system will automatically record screen and system audio.
ScreenRecording.readyToRecord: Ready to start full screen recording
ScreenRecording.selectFullScreen: After clicking start recording, please select "Entire Screen" in the popup
ScreenRecording.pptDescription: View PPT slides automatically generated from recorded videos, you can browse pages or return to latest content.
ScreenRecording.recordToView: Record and process video to view slides

features.title: Screen Recording Features
features.fullScreen: Full Screen Recording - Record entire screen content, capture all applications and desktop activities
features.systemAudio: System Audio - Automatically record system audio, including application sounds and media playback
features.recordControl: Recording Control - Provide pause/resume functionality, flexible control of recording process
features.multiFormat: Multi-format Download - Support WebM (fast) and MP4 (high quality) video formats

OnlineVideo.title: Online Video to PPT
OnlineVideo.description: Enter online video link, automatically download and convert to PPT
OnlineVideo.linkPlaceholder: Enter video link (supports YouTube, Bilibili, etc.)
OnlineVideo.comingSoon: This feature is under development, stay tuned!

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Video2PPT is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our video to PowerPoint conversion service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We prioritize your privacy and minimize data collection:
items: Video files you upload are processed locally on your device when possible
Basic analytics data to improve our service performance
Error logs to help us diagnose and fix technical issues
No personal identification information is required or stored

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: The limited information we collect is used only to:
items: Process your video files and generate PowerPoint presentations
Improve the quality and performance of our service
Provide technical support when needed
Ensure the security and reliability of our platform

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
items: Local processing: Most video processing happens on your device
Temporary storage: Any server processing uses temporary storage only
No permanent storage: Files are automatically deleted after processing
Encrypted connections: All data transfers use HTTPS encryption

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services for:
items: Analytics to understand usage patterns (anonymized data only)
CDN services for faster content delivery
Error tracking to improve service reliability
thirdParty.note: These services are carefully selected and comply with privacy standards.

userRights.title: Your Rights
items: Use our service without creating an account
Process videos locally without uploading to our servers
Request information about any data we may have
Contact us with privacy-related questions or concerns

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We follow strict data retention policies:
items: Video files are not permanently stored on our servers
Temporary processing files are deleted within 24 hours
Analytics data is anonymized and aggregated
No personal video content is retained after processing

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. When we do, we will post the updated policy on this page and update the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
contact.email: Contact us through our website or GitHub repository
